manifesto.title: I build durable, autonomous infrastructure for complex environments.
manifesto.content:
I work at the intersection of classical design and full-stack engineering. The systems I build serve creative teams and neurodivergent founders who need structural support — not another SaaS dependency, but infrastructure they can own and operate.

This site indexes that work, organized by intent: the governing logic, the production deployments, and the creative practice.

legend.description: The governing logic and cognitive firmware.
Production deployments across enterprise, operational, and personal contexts.
The discipline of systemic research and expression.

routes.name: PROTOCOLS
routes.definition: The governing logic and cognitive firmware.
routes.description: Foundational logic — the version control for thought, the symbolic maps, and the technical scaffolds that dictate how I fabricate systems.

artifacts.title: SAVEPOINT PROTOCOL
artifacts.context: Erosion of intent across long-form creative and technical cycles.
artifacts.spec: A protocol for capturing and indexing cognitive state to prevent drift. Intent-based indexing, epistemic state capture, context window management.
artifacts.result: Teams recover faster. Decisions get bolder when fallback is documented, not theoretical.

artifacts.title: ORDER OF THE AETHERWRIGHT
artifacts.context: Lack of unified conceptual mapping in complex IP fabrication.
artifacts.spec: A creative operating system and symbolic framework. Symbolic mapping, narrative/technical orchestration, constraint-driven authorship.
artifacts.result: Used by founders and design leaders. The framework that keeps systems honest when scale introduces noise.

artifacts.title: AI DEVOPS WORKBENCH
artifacts.context: Unstructured AI interaction leads to high drift and low provenance.
artifacts.spec: A structured environment for managing multi-agent AI workflows. JSON prompting, multi-agent orchestration, context window optimization.
artifacts.result: Structured AI collaboration with traceable provenance and reduced context drift.

artifacts.title: PORTABLE AGENCY
artifacts.context: Dependence on cloud-only stacks creates geographical and data risk.
artifacts.spec: Homelab-based infrastructure for digital autonomy. Local compute stacks, offline data sovereignty, network-agnostic infrastructure.
artifacts.result: Family infrastructure runs locally. Media, backups, AI compute — works when the internet doesn't.

routes.name: APPLIED SYSTEMS
routes.description: Systems are only as valid as their performance under constraint. Production deployments where systemic logic is applied to enterprise, commercial, and personal environments.

artifacts.title: ENCORE
artifacts.spec: Routed UI logic, design systems, front-end engineering. Legacy-to-modern migration for a recruitment platform. 40,000+ users. 2.5M+ annual transactions.
artifacts.result: Maintained mission-critical platform stability and UX continuity for 12+ years. Zero catastrophic failures.

artifacts.title: JOINERY
artifacts.spec: Framework for bridging design intent and technical implementation in small, high-context teams. Structural consultancy model.
artifacts.result: Operational framework for the practice itself. The methodology applied to client engagement.

artifacts.title: AIDEN-JAE
artifacts.context: Luxury jewelry brand needing structural clarity.
artifacts.spec: Market positioning, sustainability matrix, competitive architecture. Operational e-commerce systems and manufacturing logic.
artifacts.result: Premium positioning established. Sustainable sourcing as structural advantage.

artifacts.title: EVERYDAY GOLD
artifacts.context: Niche-market operational commerce and inventory systems.
artifacts.spec: Trademark clearance, Swiss-style label system, regulatory compliance as design constraint. Modular scent-variant production system.
artifacts.result: Legally clearable brand. Regulatory information treated as first-class design content.

artifacts.title: ALTRUEISM
artifacts.spec: Complete identity system, digital platform, messaging hierarchy. Mission-driven brand needing structural coherence.
artifacts.result: Transformed incoherent brand into premium-positioned system. Work complete; client did not launch due to funding.

artifacts.title: MODERNIST HOMESTEAD
artifacts.spec: Culinary modularity, celiac health navigation, executive function scaffolding. Zero-willpower household systems for a neurodivergent family.
artifacts.result: Systemic navigation of cross-border relocation and chronic health constraints. Family runs on structure, not willpower.

routes.name: PRACTICE
routes.definition: The discipline of systemic research and expression.
routes.description: The active exercise of the system. Results of systemic research used to stress-test protocols in low-stakes, high-frequency environments.

artifacts.title: NEW CITY
artifacts.context: Intersection of systemic lore and urban theory.
artifacts.spec: Speculative fiction and narrative world-building. 40+ entity directed graph stress-testing infrastructure failure, social hierarchy, and resource flow.
artifacts.result: Operational architecture expressed as narrative. Dataset built, first sequence mapped.

artifacts.title: MATHONTAPE
artifacts.context: Applying engineering signal flow protocols to music production.
artifacts.spec: Systemic music production and audio signal flow. Engineering discipline applied to sonic composition and arrangement.
artifacts.result: Signal flow protocols produce structured, repeatable creative output.

artifacts.title: PHOTOGEOGRAPHY
artifacts.context: Can rigid visual constraints generate a cohesive geographic mapping system?
artifacts.spec: Perception-driven visual archive. Three locked aspect ratios. Format-as-honest-evidence — each image preserved in the shape it arrived.
artifacts.result: Evolved from medium-constrained archive to perception-first system.

artifacts.title: THE DEEP CUTS
artifacts.context: Managing cognitive load through high-density layout systems.
artifacts.spec: Concert poster series encoding full setlist metadata inside a grid-governed typographic system. Typographic hierarchy stress test.
artifacts.result: Grid logic holding maximum data density without breaking readability.

artifacts.title: ECHO & BONE
artifacts.context: Structuring archetypal humanity through occult and alchemical systems.
artifacts.spec: Thematic mapping and archetypal research. Symbolic taxonomy applied to narrative and visual systems.
artifacts.result: Structural vocabulary for archetypal patterns applicable across narrative and design.

artifacts.title: VERSAGRAMS
artifacts.context: Testing typographic durability within fixed grid parameters.
artifacts.spec: Study in typographic systems and parametric constraints. Fixed grids stress-tested against variable content.
artifacts.result: Constraint-driven typographic forms that hold under variable input.
